main event: An observer reported a sighting of a glowing, cigar-shaped object in Manchester, New Hampshire on July 13, 1968.
interesting points: The object hovered motionless for several minutes before suddenly accelerating and disappearing., The sighting lasted approximately 15 minutes., The witness described the object as glowing and larger than the evening planet Jupiter., The observation occurred at approximately 2240 hours., The observer had no prior interest in flying saucers and wanted no publicity.
witness description: Sgt payroll clerical, 26 years of service, age 35, female, no interest in flying saucers before this incident.
